title: Skin Clarity
body:
Often when new skins are brought into the game they offer players an advantage (and sometimes a disadvantage) based on visual effects/sounds changed from the original skin.

I believe in order to make the game fair on everyone the "colour blind" mode should also give a small outline around the abilitys in the teams colour to ensure that ability (eg blood moon yasuo q and ghostbride morgana q just to name a few that effect me) cannot provide an unfair diss advantage to those players who are slightly colorblind.
I also noticed that with the new sion skin you can barely hear the ult activation sound. I suggest that a visual effect should be added to provide clarity for this champion as it should be clear if there is an intended indication of an ability.

Thanks for reading and let me know what you think on this issue
